【课程节选】

Compliment is an expression that shows praise or admiration to someone.

"I can live for two months on a good compliment." --Mar Twain

 

Complimenting on someone's personality:

You are really a good listener!

I like you. You're really friendly!

You're very hard working!

I wish I was as organised as you!

Complimenting on someone's outfit (clothes):

You look nice!

You look amazing!

I love/like your outfit!

I love/like your shoes! Are they new?

What a lovely scarf!

That color looks good on you!

Complimenting on someone's looks:

You look beautiful!

You look handsome!

You look stunning! (gorgeous)

I hope you don't mind me saying that you...(Have you been told that you...)

Complimenting on one's home:

I love your home!

What a nice apartment!

You have a beautiful home!

It's spacious!

How cosy it is!

You have a modern kitchen!

Complimenting on one's cooking:

The food is delicious.

Did you make it from scratch?

You gotta give me the recipe!

My thanks to the chef!

Keep these in mind when complimenting:

Be sincere! You mean what you say!

Be cautious! Giving the correct compliment!

Keep your compliments short!

Keep practicing giving compliments!
